entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who tries to shut the door quietly but is caught by Snape. He is trying to get his book back.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who is furious and drops his robes to hide his leg when Harry sees him. He tries to take points from Gryffindor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who asks if he got the book back.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who doesn't believe Snape would try to steal something Dumbledore was keeping safe.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts that Snape tries to take points from.

entities.name: hallowe'en
entities.description: Hallowe'en is the holiday when Harry and his friends saw someone trying to get past the three-headed dog.

relationships.description: Snape tries to take points from Gryffindor when Harry sees him.
Harry is trying to get his book back from Snape.
